posts.post_text: February 10, 2020 at 9:37 PM#2It is not possible to use the Thru command in two dimension.your best bet would be to make sure the macros have consistent naming, like mymacro 1, mymacro 2 etc, then address the macros via partial namematch using the wildcard (*) and do the lines with +Assign Macro 1.myname*.12 + 1.myname*.13 + 1.myname*.14 etc /disabled=yesdepending on the content of your lines 12 thru 21 you could consider to combine their syntax into fewer lines via the semicolonhttp://help2.malighting.com/Page/grandMA2/…emicolon/en/3.8
